description.localized_desc: This normalizer parses common security audit logs from the Windows 2003 Event Log, localized in English. The following event IDs are covered: * 627
Ce normaliseur traite les logs d'audit de sécurité communs du Journal d'Événéments de Windows 2003, en version anglaise. Les codes d'événements suivants sont normalisés : * 627
A single sign used to display a policy change.
Un simple signe utilisé pour indiquer un changement de politique.

callbacks.callback: decoder = {'SeTcbPrivilege' : 'Ability to act as part of the operating system', 'SeMachineAccountPrivilege' : 'Ability to add workstations to the domain', 'SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege' : 'Ability to adjust memory quotas for a process', 'SeBackupPrivilege' : 'Ability to back up files and directories', 'SeChangeNotifyPrivilege' : 'Ability to bypass traverse checking', 'SeSystemtimePrivilege' : 'Ability to change the system time', 'SeCreatePagefilePrivilege' : 'Ability to create a pagefile', 'SeCreateTokenPrivilege' : 'Ability to create a token object', 'SeCreatePermanentPrivilege' : 'Ability to create permanent shared objects', 'SeDebugPrivilege' : 'Ability to debug programs', 'SeEnableDelegationPrivilege' : 'Ability to delegate trust on computers and user accounts', 'SeRemoteShutdownPrivilege' : 'Ability to shutdown a system remotely', 'SeAuditPrivilege' : 'Ability to generate security audits', 'SeIncreaseBasePriorityPrivilege' : 'Ability to increase scheduling priority', 'SeLoadDriverPrivilege' : 'Ability to load or unload device drivers', 'SeLockMemoryPrivilege' : 'Ability to lock pages in memory', 'SeSecurityPrivilege' : 'Ability to manage the security event log', 'SeSystemEnvironmentPrivilege' : 'Ability to modify firmware environment values', 'SeManageVolumePrivilege' : 'Ability to perform volume maintenance tasks', 'SeProfileSingleProcessPrivilege' : 'Ability to profile a single process', 'SeSystemProfilePrivilege' : 'Ability to profile the system performances', 'SeUndockPrivilege' : 'Ability to remove the computer from its docking station', 'SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege' : 'Ability to replace a process level token', 'SeRestorePrivilege' : 'Ability to restore files and directories', 'SeShutdownPrivilege' : 'Ability to shut the system down', 'SeSyncAgentPrivilege' : 'Ability to synchronize directory service data', 'SeTakeOwnershipPrivilege' : 'Ability to take ownership of files or other objects', } log['user_right_description'] = decoder.get(value, 'UNKNOWN')
decoder = { '1': 'NT 4.0 legacy trust', '2' : 'Kerberos realm trust', '3' : 'forest or domain trust with another active directory domain', } log['trust_type'] = decoder.get(value, 'UNKNOWN')

decoder={ '0x1' : "Client's entry in database has expired", '0x2' : "Server's entry in database has expired", '0x3' : "Requested protocol version number not supported", '0x4' : "Client's key encrypted in old master key", '0x5' : "Server's key encrypted in old master key", '0x6' : "Client not found in Kerberos database", '0x7' : "Server not found in Kerberos database", '0x8' : "Multiple principal entries in database", '0x9' : "The client or server has a null key", '0xA' : "Ticket not eligible for postdating", '0xB' : "Requested start time is later than end time", '0xC' : "KDC policy rejects requests", '0xD' : "KDC cannot accommodate requested option", '0xE' : "KDC has no support for encryption type", '0xF' : "KDC has no support for checksum type", '0x10' : "KDC has no support for padata type", '0x11' : "KDC has no support for transited type", '0x12' : "Clients credentials have been revoked", '0x13' : "Credentials for server have been revoked", '0x14' : "TGT has been revoked", '0x15' : "Client not yet valid", '0x16' : "Server not yet valid", '0x17' : "Password has expired", '0x18' : "Pre-authentication information was invalid", '0x19' : "Additional pre-authentication required", '0x1F' : "Integrity check on decrypted field failed", '0x20' : "Ticket expired", '0x21' : "Ticket not yet valid", '0x22' : "Request is a replay", '0x23' : "The ticket isn't for us", '0x24' : "Ticket and authenticator don't match", '0x25' : "Clock skew too great", '0x26' : "Incorrect net address", '0x27' : "Protocol version mismatch", '0x28' : "Invalid message type", '0x29' : "Message stream modified", '0x2A' : "Message out of order", '0x2C' : "Specified version of key is not available", '0x2D' : "Service key not available", '0x2E' : "Mutual authentication failed", '0x2F' : "Incorrect message direction", '0x30' : "Alternative authentication method required", '0x31' : "Incorrect sequence number in message", '0x32' : "Inappropriate type of checksum in message", '0x3C' : "Generic error", '0x3D' : "Field is too long for this implementation", } log['reason'] = decoder.get(value, "-")

pattern.name: eventID-00627

description.localized_desc: Tentative infructueuse de changement de mot de passe

pattern.text: Change Password Attempt:\s+Target Account Name: _TARGETACCOUNT_\s+Target Domain: _TARGETDOMAIN_\s+Target Account ID: _TARGETACCOUNTID_\s+Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Privileges: _PRIVILEGES_

description.localized_desc: The user attempting to change the password, can be Anonymous as a logon is not required to do so
L'utilisateur tentant de changer le mot de passe, peut être un compte anonyme car l'opération ne nécessite pas d'être authentifié
an undocumented value, empty most of the time
un champ non documenté, de valeur nulle la plupart du temps

example.text: Change Password Attempt: Target Account Name: user Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\user Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x130650) Privileges: -

pattern.name: eventID-00632-00633-00636-00637-00650-00651-00655-00656-00660-00661-00665-00666

description.localized_desc: Changement opéré sur un membre de Groupe de Sécurité

pattern.text: Security (?:Enabled|Disabled) (?:Global|Local|Universal) Group Member (?:Added|Removed):\s+Member Name: _MEMBER_\s+Member ID: _MEMBERID_\s+Target Account Name: _TARGETACCT_\s+Target Domain: _TARGETDOMAIN_\s+Target Account ID: _TARGETACCTID_\s+Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Privileges: _PRIVILEGES_

description.localized_desc: L'utilisateur à l'origine de la modification

example.text: Security Enabled Global Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Global Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Local Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Local Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Local Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Local Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Global Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Global Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Universal Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Universal Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Universal Group Member Added: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Universal Group Member Removed: Member Name: cn=alice,DC=elmw2,DC=local Member ID: ELMW2\alicej Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: -

pattern.name: eventID-00634-00638-00647-00652-00657-00662-00667
pattern.text: (?:Computer Account|(?:Security (?:Enabled|Disabled) (?:Global|Local|Universal) Group)) Deleted:\s+Target Account Name: _TARGETACCT_\s+Target Domain: _TARGETDOMAIN_\s+Target Account ID: _TARGETACCTID_\s+Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Privileges: _PRIVILEGES_

description.localized_desc: L'utilisateur à l'origine de la modification

example.text: Security Enabled Global Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Local Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -
Computer Account Deleted: Target Account Name: COMP1$ Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: comp1 Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Local Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Global Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

Security Enabled Universal Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

Security Disabled Universal Group Deleted: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: -

pattern.name: eventID-00635-00639-00641-00648-00649-00653-00654-00658-00659-00663-00664

description.localized_desc: Various group creation or change events
Événements de création ou de changement de groupes variés

pattern.text: Security (?:Enabled|Disabled) (?:Global|Local|Universal) Group (?:Created|Changed):\s+(?:Target|New) Account Name: _TARGETACCT_\s+(?:Target|New) Domain: _TARGETDOMAIN_\s+(?:Target|New) Account ID: _TARGETACCTID_\s+Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Privileges: _PRIVILEGES_\s+(?:Changed )?Attributes:\s+Sam Account Name: _SAMACCT_\s+Sid History: _SIDHISTORY_

description.localized_desc: L'utilisateur à l'origine de la modification
le nom de compte utilisé par les clients de version antérieure à windows 2003
the previous SID of the user, in case it was moved from a domain
les précédents SID de l'utilisateur, si celui-ci provient d'un autre domaine

example.text: Security Enabled Local Group Created: New Account Name: AccountingStaff New Domain: ELMW2 New Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Attributes: Sam Account Name: TestGroup Sid History: -

Security Disabled Local Group Created: Target Account Name: Employees_distrib Target Domain: RESEARCH Target Account ID: %{S-1-5-21-184992632-1607737289-1287950321-1190} Caller User Name: Alebovsky Caller Domain: RESEARCH Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x59DF36) Privileges: - Attributes: Sam Account Name: Employees_distrib Sid History: -

Security Disabled Global Group Created: New Account Name: AccountingStaff New Domain: ELMW2 New Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Attributes: Sam Account Name: TestGroup Sid History: -

Security Enabled Universal Group Created: New Account Name: AccountingStaff New Domain: ELMW2 New Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Attributes: Sam Account Name: TestGroup Sid History: -

Security Disabled Universal Group Created: New Account Name: AccountingStaff New Domain: ELMW2 New Account ID: ELMW2\AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Attributes: Sam Account Name: TestGroup Sid History: -

Security Enabled Local Group Changed: Target Account Name: Accounting Target Domain: STG Target Account ID: STG\Accounting Caller User Name: wsmith Caller Domain: STG Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x31AA8) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

Security Enabled Global Group Changed: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

Security Disabled Local Group Changed: Target Account Name: Employees_distrib Target Domain: RESEARCH Target Account ID: %{S-1-5-21-184992632-1607737289-1287950321-1190} Caller User Name: Alebovsky Caller Domain: RESEARCH Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x59DF36) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

Security Disabled Global Group Changed: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

Security Enabled Universal Group Changed: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

Security Disabled Universal Group Changed: Target Account Name: AccountingStaff Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: AccountingStaff Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Sid History: -

pattern.name: eventID-00644-00671
pattern.text: User Account (?:Unlocked|Locked Out):\s+Target Account Name: _TARGETACCT_\s+(?:Target Domain: _TARGETDOMAIN_\s+)?Target Account ID: _TARGETACCTID_\s+(?:Caller Machine Name: _SOURCEHOST_\s+)?Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_

description.localized_desc: The machine from which the action is taken
La machine depuis laquelle l'action est effectuée
The user locking or unlocking the account
L'utilisateur verrouillant ou déverrouillant le compte cible

example.text: User Account Locked Out: Target Account Name: alicej Target Account ID: ELMW2\alicej Caller Machine Name: W3DC Caller User Name: W2DC$ Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x3E7)
User Account Unlocked: Target Account Name: harold Target Domain: ELM Target Account ID: ELM\harold Caller User Name: administrator Caller Domain: ELM Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x158EB7)

pattern.name: eventID-00682-00683

description.localized_desc: connexion à/déconnexion d'une station de travail

pattern.text: Session (?:reconnected to|disconnected from) winstation:\s+User Name: _USER_\s+Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Session Name: _SESSIONNAME_\s+Client Name: _SOURCEHOST_\s+Client Address: _SOURCEIP_

description.localized_desc: The user connecting or disconnecting from the terminal server session
L'utilisateur se connectant ou se déconnectant d'une session terminal server
The machine from which the action is taken
La machine depuis laquelle l'action est effectuée
The machine from which the action is taken
La machine depuis laquelle l'action est effectuée

example.text: Session reconnected to winstation: User Name: administrator Domain: ELMW2 Logon ID: (0x0,0xBBA2) Session Name: RDP-Tcp#5 Client Name: CPQ Client Address: 10.42.42.90
Session disconnected from winstation: User Name: administrator Domain: ELMW2 Logon ID: (0x0,0x5BAA5) Session Name: Unknown Client Name: CPQ Client Address: 10.42.42.90

pattern.name: eventID-00673-00674

description.localized_desc: Événements concernant des tickets de service

pattern.text: Service Ticket (?:Request|Renewed):\s+User Name:(?: _USER_)?\s+User Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Service Name: _SERVICENAME_\s+Service ID: _SERVICEID_\s+Ticket Options: _TICKETOPTIONS_\s+Ticket Encryption Type: _TICKETENCRYPTIONTYPE_\s+Client Address: _SOURCEIP_(?:\s+Failure Code: _FAILURECODE_\s+Logon GUID: _GUID_\s+Transited Services: _TRANSITEDSERVICES_)?

description.localized_desc: L'utilisateur se connectant ou se déconnectant d'une session terminal server

example.text: Service Ticket Request: User Name: User Domain: SERVER.APPLEADV.COM Service Name: host/server1.server.appleadv.com Service ID: - Ticket Options: 0x40830000 Ticket Encryption Type: - Client Address: 127.0.0.1 Failure Code: 0xD Logon GUID: - Transited Services: -

Service Ticket Renewed: User Name: qbvm$@MONTEREYTECHGROUP.COM User Domain: MONTEREYTECHGROUP.COM Service Name: krbtgt Service ID: MTG\krbtgt Ticket Options: 0x2 Ticket Encryption Type: 0x17 Client Address: 10.42.42.24

pattern.name: eventID-00643
pattern.text: Domain Policy Changed:\s+_POLICY_ modified\s+Domain Name: _POLICYDOMAIN_\s+Domain ID: _POLICYDOMAINID_\s+Caller User Name: _USER_\s+Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_\s+Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_\s+Privileges: _PRIVILEGES_\s+Changed Attributes:\s+Min. Password Age: _MINPASSWDAGE_\s+Max. Password Age: _MAXPASSWDAGE_\s+Force Logoff: _FORCELOGOFF_\s+Lockout Threshold: _LOCKOUTTHRESHOLD_\s+Lockout Observation Window: _LOCKOUTOBSWINDOW_\s+Lockout Duration: _LOCKOUTDURATION_\s+Password Properties: _PASSWDPROPERTIES_\s+Min. Password Length: _MINPASSWDLENGTH_\s+Password History Length: _PASSWDHISTORYLENGTH_\s+Machine Account Quota: _MACHINEACCTQUOTA_\s+Mixed Domain Mode: _MIXEDDOMAINMODE_\s+Domain Behavior Version: _DOMAINBEHAVIORVERSION_\s+OEM Information

description.localized_desc: Le nom de domaine de la politique
L'identifiant de domaine de la politique
L'âge minimal du mot de passe
L'âge maximal du mot de passe
The password properties as a bit code
Les propriétés de mot de passe
La longueur de mot de passe minimale
La nombre de mots de passe conservés en historique
La version de comportement de domaine

example.text: Domain Policy Changed: - modified Domain Name: ELM Domain ID: ELM Caller User Name: administrator Caller Domain: ELM Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x158EB7) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Min. Password Age: - Max. Password Age: - Force Logoff: - Lockout Threshold: - Lockout Observation Window: - Lockout Duration: - Password Properties: - Min. Password Length: - Password History Length: - Machine Account Quota: - Mixed Domain Mode: - Domain Behavior Version: 2 OEM Information: -

pattern.name: eventID-00678
pattern.text: Account Mapped for Logon.\s+Mapping Attempted By: _ACCTMAPPER_\s+Client Name: _USER_\s+Mapped Name: _MAPPEDNAME_
